cvData.about: Senior Engineering Manager with over 15 years of experience in building and leading high-performing technology teams. Passionate about fostering innovation, mentoring engineers, and delivering scalable software solutions that drive business value.

experience.title: Senior Engineering Manager
experience.description: Leading a team of 25 engineers across 4 product squads. Responsible for the development and delivery of the company's flagship cloud platform.

experience.title: Engineering Manager
experience.description: Managed two development teams focused on building enterprise-grade data analytics tools.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Led the architecture and implementation of distributed systems for financial services clients.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering
